Class HospitalStaffController

java.lang.Object
control.user.HospitalStaffController
public class HospitalStaffController extends Object
The HospitalStaffController class provides methods for managing hospital staff entities. It allows for adding, removing, finding, and listing staff members. It interacts with the StaffRepository to perform data operations on hospital staff records.

  • Method Details

    • getAllStaff

      public static List<HospitalStaff> getAllStaff()
      Retrieves all hospital staff from the repository.
      Returns:
      a list of all hospital staff

    • addStaff

      public static HospitalStaff addStaff(String name, String gender, HospitalStaff.Role role, LocalDate dob) throws InvalidInputException
      Adds a new staff member to the repository after validating the input parameters. If the input is invalid, an InvalidInputException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the staff member
      gender - the gender of the staff member (male or female)
      role - the role of the staff member (Doctor, Pharmacist, etc.)
      dob - the date of birth of the staff member (must be between 18 and 100)
      Returns:
      true if the staff member was successfully added, false otherwise
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - if any of the input parameters are invalid

    • updateStaff

      public static void updateStaff(HospitalStaff staff, String name, String gender, HospitalStaff.Role role, LocalDate dob) throws InvalidInputException
      Updates the details of an existing staff member. Ensures that all input parameters are valid before updating the staff record.
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff member to update
      name - the new name of the staff member
      gender - the new gender of the staff member
      role - the new role of the staff member
      dob - the new date of birth of the staff member
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - if any of the input parameters are invalid

    • removeStaff

      public static void removeStaff(HospitalStaff staff) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Removes a staff member from the repository. If the staff member does not exist in the repository, an EntityNotFoundException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff member to remove
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the staff member cannot be found

    • findById

      public static HospitalStaff findById(String id) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Finds a staff member by their ID. If the staff member does not exist, an EntityNotFoundException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the staff member
      Returns:
      the staff member with the specified ID
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the staff member cannot be found

    • findByField

      public static List<HospitalStaff> findByField(String field, String value) throws InvalidInputException
      Finds staff members by a specific field and its value. If the field or value is invalid, an InvalidInputException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      field - the name of the field to search by
      value - the value to search for
      Returns:
      a list of staff members matching the field and value
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - if the field or value is invalid
